title: Home
text:
39 North Labs, LLC. is a boutique consulting firm offering a range of professional services in the field of data analytics and informatics, with a focus on public sector datasets and an advanced GIS & mapping capability.
We also publish several open-source software libraries to elevate the state of the art in analytics.
Contact us today for assistance with:

Public records access and government data mining
GIS and spatial intelligence
GIS programming and mapping application development

Email gavin@39n.io schedule an introductory call.

title: About
text:
Our company is named after the 39th Parallel North.
The 39th parallel is a circle of latitude that includes areas of New Jersey, but stretches.
This name reflects our focus on spatial data science, our local roots in New Jersey, and a global vision to provide data science thought leadership & expertise to our clients and the wider data community.

title: Open Source Software
text:
39 North Labs maintains several open-source packages to assist with data science workflows, with a focus on the R & Python programming languages.
While these packages are free and open for anyone to use, professional support for implementing them is available through our professional services practice.

title: About
text:
What We Do
39 North Labs, LLC is a boutique consulting firm that provides consulting services, custom programming & educational / training services for private, public sector and individual clients.
We also develop widely used open-source software packages for data science & related programming languages. These packages have been widely adopted in business, higher education and by individuals working with geospatial data for research and business / clinical use cases.
These services leverage our capacity in advanced analytics and informatics tools for value creation.

title: Professional Services
text:
From designing data collection & infrastructure solutions, to high-impact interactive visualizations, we can craft a custom solution to fit your project’s needs.


We can help your business create value from public sector datasets. This includes mining data from public entities for value creation and lead generation.
We can also provide guidance on utilizing freedom of information (FOI) laws such as New Jersey’s Open Public Records Act (OPRA) to obtain data that could be potentially valuable for your business.



The world of online content sources can be a valuable source for business intelligence. We can develop custom solutions for scraping data from public websites as well as mining social media datasets for localized intelligence and public sentiment analysis.



Our advanced analytics capabilities can help you solve business problems.



We can provide customized training for your organization to assist with data-driven decisionmaking and business intelligence.

title: Platforms
text: We have developed several software-as-a-service platforms to serve the business community.

title: Open Source Software
text:
R Packages

zipcodeR
The zipcodeR package for R is one of the programming language’s most widely used packages for performing analysis on ZIP code level spatial datasets.


njgeo
The njgeo package provides an R interface to New Jersey’s official state geocoding APIs in a format native to R users.


njtr1
njtr1 enables road safety research by providing an easy R interface for programatically obtaining geotagged motor vehicle accident data for analysis purposes.
